remarks: Met with President Carlos Alvarado and visited the Joint Operations Center.

remarks: Met with Prime Minister Holness, conducted a multilateral roundtable discussion with Caribbean leaders, and delivered remarks on U.S.-Caribbean relations.

remarks: Met with U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson and U.K. Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab.

remarks: Met with President Joao Lourenço and Foreign Minister Manuel Augusto.

remarks: Met with Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed and President Sahle-Work Zewde. Also met with African Union Commission Chairperson Moussa Faki Mahamat.

remarks: Discussed regional and bilateral issues with Saudi leadership.

remarks: Met with Sultan Haitham bin Tarik and expressed his condolences on the death of Oman’s Sultan Qaboos bin Said.

name: Michael R. Pompeo
remarks: Met with Qatari Amir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani and Foreign Minister Sheikh Mohammad bin Abdulrahman Al Thani. Attended the signing of the U.S.-Taliban Peace Deal.

remarks: Met with Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen. Also met with Danish Minister of Foreign Affairs Jeppe Koford, Faroese Minister of Foreign Affairs and Education Jenis av Rana, and Greenlandic Minister of Foreign Affairs and Energy Steen Lynge.

name: Michael R. Pompeo
remarks: Joined Foreign Minister Petricek in Pilsen to commemorate the liberation of Western Czechoslovakia. In Prague, met with Prime Minister Babis and had a courtesy call with President Zeman.

remarks: Met with President Pahor and Prime Minister Jansa.

remarks: Met with Foreign Minister Schallenberg and Chancellor Kurz. Also met with IAEA Director General Grossi.

remarks: Met with Prime Minister Morawiecki and Foreign Minister Czaputowicz. Also met with President Duda.

remarks: Led the U.S. delegation to the presidential inauguration of Luis Abinader.

remarks: Met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

remarks: Met with Prime Minister Abdalla Hamdok and Sovereign Council Chair General Abdel Fattah el-Burhan.

remarks: Met with Sultan Haitham bin Tarik Al Said.

remarks: Attended the opening ceremony of Afghanistan peace negotiations.

remarks: Met with President Anastasiades and Foreign Minister Christodoulides.

remarks: Met with President Chan Santokhi.

remarks: Met with President Irfaan Ali and CARICOM Secretary-General Irwin LaRocque.

remarks: Met with Prime Minister Plenković, Foreign Minister Grlić Radman, and Defense Minister Banožić.

name: Michael R. Pompeo
remarks: Led, with Secretary of Defense Mark T. Esper, the third annual U.S.-India 2+2 Ministerial Dialogue. Met with Minister of External Affairs Subrahmanyam Jaishankar and Minister of Defense Rajnath Singh.
